array.name: exmoring_kis
array.item: LITANIA

Ee mwanga wa kweli unayeangazia yeyote ajaye duniani, kwa upendo wako kwa wanadamu ujulikuja duniani na viumbe vyote vilifurahia kuja kwako. Ulimwokoa baba yetu Adamu kutokana na udanganyifu wa nyoka, na kumuokoa mama yetu Hawa kutoka katika meno ya kifo na kutupatia roho wa uridhi. tunakikusifu na kukubariki tukisema:
Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu.

Ee Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo Mwanga wa kweli anayetuangazia mchana kutwa, hebu mwanga wa nafsi yako na akili zako zing ae ndani yetu. Usiruhusu maumivu ya huzuni kututawala, ili kwa kuelewa tuweze kukusifu pamoja na Daudi tukisema, “Nakaa macho usiku kucha, nikitafakari juu ya ahadi zako”, Ee Bwana Mungu wetu kwa upendo wako, sikia sauti zetu kwa huruma zako nyingi na utuokoe.
Sasa na wakati wote na hata milele milele, Amina.

Ee mama wa Mungu, mbingu ya pili, mama wa mwanga, kuanzia jua litokapo hadi lizamapo watu wanakusifu, wewe ni ua usiobadili uzuri wake, na tena wewe ni mama uliye bikira daima, jinsi Baba alikuchagua, na Roho Mtakatifu akakufunika, na Mwana akashuka na kuchukua mwili kutoka kwako, hebu muombe atujalie wokovu katika dunia aliyoiumba na kuiokoa kutoka katika majaribu. Hebu tumsifu kwa wimbo mpya na tumbariki sasa na wakati wote na milele hata milele, Amina.
SIFA YA MALAIKA

Hebu tuimbe pamoja na malaika tukisema: “Atukuzwe Mungu juu mbinguni na duniani iwe amani kwa watu wote”. Tunakusifu, tunakubariki, tunakutumikia, tunakusujudia, tunakuungamia, tunakutangaza utukufu wako, tunakushukuru kwa ajili ya ukuu wa utukufu wako. Ee Bwana mfalme wa mbingu, Mungu Baba Mwenyezi, na Bwana Mwana wa pekee Yesu Kristo, na Roho Mtakatifu. Ee Bwana Mungu, kondoo wa Mungu, Mwana wa Baba, muondoa dhambi za ulimwengu utuhurumie, ewe uliyebeba dhambi ya ulimwengu kubali sala zetu kwako. Ee uliyekaa mkono wa kuume wa Baba tuhurumie, wewe pekee ndiwe mtakatifu, wewe pekee ndiwe uliyejuu; Bwana Yesu Kristo na Roho Mtakatifu, utukufu uwe kwa Mungu Baba, Amina. Nakubariki kila siku, na kulisifu jina lako takatifu milele hata milele, Amina. Tangu usiku roho yangu inakutafuta mapema, kwa maana amri zako zina nuru juu ya dunia, nazifuata njia zako kwa sababu umekuwa msaada kwangu, asubuhi na mapema utasikia sauti yangu, alfajiri nitasimama mbele yako na utaniona.
UTUKUFU WA UTATU MTAKATIFU

Mtakatifu Mungu, Mtakatifu Mwenyezi, Mtakatifu aishiye milele. Aliyezaliwa na bikira Maria utuhurumie. Mtakatifu Mungu, Mtakatifu Mwenyezi, Mtakatifu aishiye milele. Aliyesulubiwa kwa ajili yetu utuhurumie. Mtakatifu Mungu, Mtakatifu Mwenyezi, Mtakatifu aishiye milele. Aliyefufuka kutoka kwa wafu na kupaa mbinguni tuhurumie. Utukufu uwe kwa Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu, sasa na wakati wote na milele milele , Amina. Ee Utatu Mtakatifu tuhurumie. Ee Utatu Mtakatifu tuhurumie. Ee Utatu Mtakatifu tuhurumie. Bwana tusamehe dhambi zetu, Bwana tusamehe hatia zetu, Bwana tusamehe makosa yetu, Bwana yafikie magonjwa ya watu wako, uwaponye kwa ajili ya jina lako takatifu. Baba zetu na ndugu zetu waliolala uwafariji nafsi zao. Ee wewe usiye na hatia Bwana tuhurumie, Ee wewe usiye na hatia utusaidie na uzikubali sala zetu kwako, kwa kuwa utukufu wa utatu nikwako, Bwana tuhurumie, Bwana tuhurumie, Bwana utubariki, Amina. Ee Bwana tustahilishe kuomba kwa shukrani; Baba yetu uliye mbinguni...
SALAMU KWA MTAKATIFU MARIA

Salamu kwako. Twakuomba Ee mtakatifu uliyejaa utukufu, Bikira daima, mama wa Mungu, mama yake Kristo, uyainue maombi yetu kwa mwanao mpendwa, ili aweze kutusamehe dhambi zetu. Salamu kwako Bikira mtakatifu uliyetuzalia Mwanga wa kweli, Kristo Bwana wetu, umwombe Bwana kwa niaba yetu ili aweze kutuhurumia na kutusamehe dhambi zetu. Ee Bikira Maria, mama wa Mungu, mtakatifu na mwombezi mwaminifu wa jamii za watu, tuombee kwa niaba yetu mbele ya Kristo uliyemzaa kwamba atuwezeshe kupokea msamaha wa dhambi zetu. Salamu kwako Bikira, malkia wa kweli, salamu kwa ajili ya haja za mataifa, ambaye kwa ajili yetu ulimzaa Imanueli. Twakuomba mwombezi mwaminifu, utukumbuke mbele ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ili aweze kutusamehe dhambi zetu.
UTANGULIZI WA KANUNI YA IMANI.

Tunakukuza ee mama wa Mwanga wa kweli; na tunakusifu ee mama mtakatifu mama wa Mungu. Kwani umetuzalia Mwokozi wa ulimwengu nzima. Aliyekuja na kuokoa nafsi zetu. Utukufu uwe kwako ee Kristo Bwana wetu na Mfalme wetu; heshima ya mitume, taji la mashahidi, furaha kwa wenye haki, uthabiti wa makanisa, na uondoleo la dhambi. Tunaeza na kuhubiri utatu Mtakatifu, tabia ya Mungu mmoja. Tunamsujudia na kumtukuza. Bwana tuhurumie, Bwana tuhurumie, Bwana utuletee baraka zako, Amina.
KANUNI YA IMANI

Kweli tunasadiki kwa Mungu mmoja, Mungu Baba Mtawala wa wote, aliyeumba mbingu na nchi, na vitu vyote vinavyoonekana na vile visivyoonekana. Pia tunasadiki kwa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo, Mwana wa pekee wa Mungu, aliyezaliwa kutoka kwa Baba kabla ya dhahiri yote. Mwanga kutoka Mwanga, Mungu kweli kutoka Mungu kweli. Aliyezaliwa wala si kuumbwa; aliye sawa na Baba, kwa yeye vitu vyote vilifanyika. Huyu ndiye kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu na kwa wokovu wetu alishuka kutoka mbinguni, alipata umbo la mtu kutoka kwa Roho Mtakatifu na kwa Bikira Maria na akawa mwanadamu. Akasulubiwa kwa ajili yetu wakati wa Pontio Pilato, akateswa na kuzikwa, akafufuka siku ya tatu kutoka kwa wafu kama ilivyoandikwa kwenye maandiko matakatifu. Akapaa mbinguni, akaketi kulia kwa Baba, na atakuja tena katika utukufu wake kuwaamua wazima na wafu; na ufalme wake hautakuwa na mwisho. Ndiyo tunasadiki kwa Roho Mtakatifu, Bwana mpaji wa uzima aliyetoka kwa Baba, tumsujudia na kumtukuza pamoja na Baba na Mwana, aliyesema katika manabii. Na Kanisa Moja la Pekee, Takatifu, la Mitume, Ulimwenguni. Tunakiri ubatizo moja wa uondoleo la dhambi. Tunangojea ufufuko wa wafu na uzima wa dhahiri ijayo, Amina.
Ee Bwana utusikie, utuhurumie na utusamehe dhambi zetu, Amina. Kiryeleison; Bwana utuhurumie, mara 41 (13*3+1*2).
MTAKATIFU MTAKATIFU MTAKATIFU:

Mtakatifu, mtakatifu, mtakatifu Bwana wa majeshi, mbingu na nchi zimejaa utukufu na heshima yako, utuonee huruma Ee Mungu Baba Mtawala wa wote, Ee Utatu Mtakatifu utuonee huruma, Ee Mungu, Bwana wa majeshi uwe nasi, kwani hatuna msaada katika masumbuko na taabu zetu ila wewe. Ee Mungu utuondolee na utusamehe dhambi zetu, tuliyofanya tukijua na tusiyoyajua, yaliyofichika na yaliyo dhahiri. Ee Bwana utusamehe kulingana na jina lako takatifu tuliyoitwa nayo, kwa mapenzi yako Ee Bwana, na siyo kulingana na dhambi zetu. Ee Bwana tustahilishe kuomba kwa shukrani; Baba yetu uliye mbinguni...
SALA YA KWANZA YA UTAKASO

Ee Mungu, Bwana wa majeshi, aliyekuwepo kabla ya dahari yote, na wa daima ya milele, aliye umba jua kwa ajili ya mchana usiku kwa ajili ya watu kupumzika. Tunakushukuru Ee Mfalme kwani umetujalia kupitia usiku kwa amani na kutuleta mpaka asubuhi hii. Tunakusihi, Ee mfalme wetu, mfalme wa milele. Hebu uso wako ituangaze na mwanga wa utukufu wa akili zako utujalie tuwe wana wa mwanga na wana wa mchana, ili tupitie mchana huu kwa uwema, na kwa usafi wa roho, na kwa tabia njema, na tuweze kumaliza siku zote za maisha yetu bila kujikwaa kupitia kwa neema, huruma na upendo vya Mwana wako wa pekee Yesu Kristo na zawadi ya Roho Mtakatifu, sasa na wakati wote, na milele hata milele, Amina.
SALA YA PILI YA UTAKASO

Ee Mungu uletaye mwanga, wewe utumaye jua kuangazia watu wema na waovu, uliyeumba mwanga kuangazia ulimwengu, ebu angaza akili zetu, mioyo yetu na ufahamu zetu. Ee Bwana wa wote, utuwezeshe kutufurahisha siku hii. Utulinde kutokana na uovu wote, dhambi zote na nguvu zote za adui, kupitia kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo Bwana wetu anayebarikiwa pamoja na wewe, na Roho Mtakatifu mpaji wa uzima, aliye sawa na wewe sasa na wakati wote, na milele hata milele, Amina.
SALA YA MWISHO WA KILA SAA

Utuonee huruma Ee Mungu na utuhurumie, wewe ambaye kila wakati na kila saa husujudiwa na kutukuzwa mbinguni na hata duniani. Kristo Mungu wetu mwema, mvumilivu, mwenye huruma nyingi na roho safi, apendaye watu wema na mwenye huruma kwa wenye dhambi ambaye mimi ni mmoja wao, wewe hupendi kifo kwa mwenye dhambi bali kuungama na kuishi, wewe uitae wote kwa wokovu kupitia ahadi nyingi zijaazo. Bwana pokea sala zetu wakati huu na wakati wowote. Rahisisha maisha yetu, na utuongoze kufanya kulingana na amri zako. Takasa roho zetu. Safisha kabisa miili yetu na urekebishe akili zetu, takasa nia zetu na uponye maradhi yetu. Utusamehe dhambi zetu, utuokoe na hasira kali na huzuni wa moyo. Utuzingire na malaika wako watakatifu ili kuongozwa na kulindwa pamoja na majeshi wao tuweze kuwa na umoja wa imani na ufahamu wa utukufu wako isiyo na kipimo na isiyo onekana. Na baraka zote ni kwako milele hata milele. Amina.
Ee Bwana tustahilishe kuomba kwa shukrani; Baba yetu uliye mbinguni...

array.name: exmoring_eng
array.item: LITANIES

O True Light, that enlightens every man, that comes into the world. You came to the world because of Your love to mankind, and all the creation rejoiced at Your coming. You saved our forefather Adam from temptation and our mother Eve from the pangs of death and granted us the spirit to be Your children— we praise You, we bless You saying;
Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

When the morning hour approaches, O Christ our God the True Light, let the senses and the thoughts of the light shine upon us, and let us not be covered by the darkness of pain that we may deeply praise You with David, saying: “My eyes are awake through the night, that I may meditate on Your word”. Listen to our voices according to Your great mercy, and save us, O Lord our God, through Your compassion.
Now and forever, and unto the ages of ages. Amen.

You are the honorable Mother of the light. Everywhere under the sun, people offer you glorification, the Mother of God, the second heaven. For you are the bright and unchangeable blossom, and the evervirgin Mother, for the Father chose you, the Holy Spirit over shadowed you and the Son, in humility, was incarnated from you. May you ask Him to redeem the world He has created, and deliver it from tribulations. Let us sing to Him a new hymn and bless Him, now and at all times and forever more. Amen
THE GLORIA

Let us sing with the angels: “Glory to God in the highest, peace on earth and good will toward men.” We praise You, we bless You, we serve You, we worship You, we confess to You, we proclaim Your glory, and we thank You for Your great glory. O Lord the heavenly King, God the Father Almighty, and our Lord, the onlybegotten Son, Jesus Christ, and the Holy Spirit. O Lord, Lamb of God and Son of the Father, who takes away the sin of the world, have mercy upon us. Accept our supplications, You who sits at the right hand of the Father, have mercy upon us. For You alone are holy. You alone are the most high, my Lord Jesus Christ, with the Holy Spirit. Glory be to God the Father, Amen. I give You blessing daily, and praise Your holy name forevermore, Amen. Since the night, my spirit seeks You early, O my God, for Your commandments are the light that shines on the earth. Continually I pursue Your ways, for You became a help to me. Early my Lord You shall hear my voice. Tomorrow I stand before You, and You shall see me.
THE TRESAGION

Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who was born of the virgin. Have mercy upon us. Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who was crucified for our sake. Have mercy upon us. Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Immortal, who arose from the dead and ascended to the heavens. Have mercy upon us. Glory be to the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit. Now and forever more. Amen. O Holy Trinity, have mercy upon us. O Holy Trinity, have mercy upon us. O Holy Trinity, have mercy upon us. O Lord, forgive us our sins. O Lord, forgive us our trespasses. O Lord, forgive us our transgressions. O God, be with those who are sick. Heal them for the sake of Your holy name. O Lord, repose the souls of those who have passed over to You. O Lord who is without fault, have mercy upon us. Support us and accept our prayers, for Yours is the glory, honor and triple holiness. Lord have mercy, Lord have mercy, Lord bless us, Amen. O Lord make us worthy to pray thankfully; Our Father, Who art in...
HAILTO SAINT MARY

Hail to Saint Mary, full of grace, the ever-virgin, mother of God, mother of Christ, may you lift our prayers to your beloved Son to forgive us our sins. Hail to the holy virgin, mother of true light, Christ our Lord. May you ask our Lord to have mercy upon our souls and forgive us our sins. O Virgin Mary, mother of God, who pleads for mankind, pray for the forgiveness of our sins before Christ to whom you gave birth. Hail to you, O Virgin and true queen, Hail to the pride of mankind, mother of Emmanuel, remember us O faithful pleader, before our Lord Jesus Christ, may He forgive us our sins.
INTRODUCTION TO THE CREED

We honor you, Mother of True Light and glorify you, O Holy Virgin Mother of God, for you gave birth to the Savior of the World. He came and saved our souls. Glory to You, our Master and King Jesus Christ, Pride of the Apostles, Crown of the Martyrs, Joy of the righteous, Steadiness of the churches, Remission of sins. We preach the Holy Trinity, the One Divinity, whom we worship and honor. Lord have mercy, Lord have mercy, Lord bless us. Amen.
THE CREED

Truly we believe in One God, the Almighty God, the Father, maker of heaven and earth, of all things visible and invisible. We believe in one Lord, Jesus Christ the only begotten Son of God, born of the Father before all ages; light out of light, true God out of true God, begotten not made; consubstantial with the Father, through whom all things came into being. He descended from heaven for us and for our salvation, and was incarnated from the Holy Spirit and of the Virgin Mary, and became man. He was crucified for us at the time of Pontius Pilate. He suffered and was buried; arose from the dead on the third day in accordance with the Scriptures; He ascended to the heavens and sat at the right hand of the Father; He shall also come in His glory to judge the living and the dead; of whose kingdom there will be no end. Truly we believe in the Holy Spirit, the Life-giving Lord, who proceeds from the Father, we worship and glorify Him together with the Father and the Son, who spoke in the prophets. And in one, holy, universal and Apostolic Church. We acknowledge one baptism for the remission of sins. And we look for the resurrection of the dead and the life of the world to come, Amen
O Lord Hear us, have mercy on us and forgive us our sins, Amen. Kiryeleison; Lord have mercy, 41 times (13*3+1*2).
HOLY HOLY HOLY

Holy, Holy, Holy is the Lord of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of Your glory and honor. God the Father Almighty, have mercy upon us. O Holy Trinity have mercy upon us. O Lord, God of hosts, be with us, for we have no other supporter in our tribulations and adversities but You. O God, absolve, remit and forgive us our sins which we have done willingly and unwillingly, and those which we committed knowingly and unknowingly, the hidden and the visible. O Lord forgive us for the sake of Your Holy Name that is called upon us, and according to Your mercy and not to our sins. Make us worthy to pray thankfully; Our Father, Who art in heaven...
THE FIRST ABSOLUTION

O Lord, God of hosts, existing before the ages and abiding forever, Who created the sun to light up the day, and the night to provide rest for all people. We thank You our eternal King, for You passed us through the night in peace and brought us to the beginning of this day. Therefore we ask You, our King, may Your light shine upon us, and may You enlighten us with the light of Your divine knowledge. Make us children of light, children of daytime, that we may complete this day in righteousness, purity and good order and that we may complete the rest of our life without any blame, through the grace, compassion and love of mankind of Your OnlyBegotten Son, Jesus Christ, and by the gift of the Holy Spirit, now and forever more. Amen
THE SECOND ABSOLUTION

O God who causes the light to burst forth, whose sun rise on the righteous and the wicked, who made light to shine on the whole world, enlighten our minds, hearts and reason, O Master of all. Grant us to please you this day. Guard us from every vile things, all sin and power of the adversary, thought our lord Jesus Christ, with whom you are blessed together with the Holy Spirit, the Giver of life,Who is of one essence with you both now and ever and unto the ages of all ages, Amen.
CONCLUDING PRAYER

Have mercy upon us O God, have mercy upon us. For You are always worshipped and glorified in heaven and on earth. O Christ, our good Lord, plenteous in patience, mercy and compassion, who loves the just and shows mercy to all sinners amongst whom I am the first. Who does not wish death for the sinner but repentance and life, calling us all to salvation for the promised forthcoming rewards. O Lord, accept our prayers of this hour and every hour. Ease our lives, and guide us to act according to Your commandments. Sanctify our souls, purify our bodies, set right our thoughts, cleanse our intentions, heal our sickness, forgive us our sins and deliver us from every evil grief and distress. Surround us with Your Holy angels that we may be guided and guarded with them to attain the unity of faith and knowledge of Your imperceptible and infinite glory, for You are blessed forever. Amen.
O Lord make us worthy to pray thankfully; Our Father, Who art in heaven...

array.name: moringbible_kis
array.item: Somo kutoka katika Injili ya Mtakatifu Yohana, baraka zake ziwe nasi sote, Amina. (Yohana 1:1 – 17)

Hapo mwanzo kulikuwako Neno, naye Neno alikuwako kwa Mungu, naye Neno alikuwa Mungu. Huyo mwanzo alikuwako kwa Mungu. Vyote vilifanyika kwa huyo; wala pasipo yeye hakikufanyika cho chote kilichofanyika. Ndani yake ndimo ulimokuwa uzima, nao ule uzima ulikuwa nuru ya watu. Nayo nuru yang’aa gizani, wala giza halikuiweza. Palitokea mtu, ametumwa kutoka kwa Mungu, jina lake Yohana. Huyo alikuja kwa ushuhuda, ili aishuhudie ile nuru, wote wapate kuamini kwa yeye. Huyo hakuwa ile nuru, bali alikuja ili aishuhudie ile nuru. Kulikuwako Nuru halisi, amtiaye nuru kila mtu, akija katika ulimwengu. Alikuwako ulimwenguni, hata kwa yeye ulimwengu ulipata kuwako, wala ulimwengu haukumtambua. Alikuja kwake, wala walio wake hawakumpokea. Bali wote waliompokea aliwapa uwezo wa kufanyika watoto wa Mungu, ndio wale waliaminio jina lake; waliozaliwa, si kwa damu, wala si kwa mapenzi ya mwili, wala si kwa mapenzi ya mtu, bali kwa Mungu. Naye Neno alifanyika mwili, akakaa kwetu; nasi tukauona utukufu wake, utukufu kama wa Mwana pekee atokaye kwa Baba; amejaa neema na kweli. Yohana alimshuhudia, akapaza sauti yake akasema, Huyu ndiye niliyenena habari zake ya kwamba, Ajaye nyuma yangu amekuwa mbele yangu; kwa maana alikuwa kabla yangu. Kwa kuwa katika utimilifu wake sisi sote tulipokea, na neema juu ya neema. Kwa kuwa torati ilitolewa kwa mkono wa Musa; neema na kweli zilikuja kwa mkono wa Yesu Kristo. UTUKUFU UWE KWA MUNGU DAIMA, AMINA.
Tunakusujudia Ewe Kristo pamoja na Baba yako mwema na Roho Mtakatifu kwa maana ulikuja na kutuokoa.

array.name: moringbible_eng
array.item: A chapter from the Holy Gospel according to St. John, may his blessings be with us all, Amen. (John 1:1-17)

In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. He was in the beginning with God. All things were made through Him, and without Him nothing was made that was made. In Him was life, and the life was the light of men. And the light shines in the darkness, and the darkness did not comprehend it. There was a man sent from God, whose name was John. This man came for a witness, to bear witness of the Light, that all through him might believe. He was not that Light, but was sent to bear witness of that Light. That was the true Light which gives light to every man coming into the world. He was in the world, and the world was made through Him, and the world did not know Him. He came to His own, and His own did not receive Him. But as many as received Him, to them He gave the right to become children of God, to those who believe in His name: who were born, not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God. And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us, and we beheld His glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father, full of grace and truth. John bore witness of Him and cried out, saying, "This was He of whom I said, ‘He who comes after me is preferred before me, for He was before me." And of His fullness we have all received, and grace for grace. For the law was given through Moses, but grace and truth came through Jesus Christ.GLORY BE TO GOD FOREVER. AMEN.
We worship You O Christ with your good Father, and the Holy Spirit, for You have come and saved us.

array.name: prepsalm_kis
array.item: †\nMAOMBI YA ASUBUHI\n(SAA YA KWANZA)

Ee njooni tusujudu, Ee njooni tumuombe Kristo Mungu wetu. Ee njooni tusujudu, Ee njooni tumsihi Kristo Mfalme wetu. Ee njooni tusujudu, Ee njooni tumdua Kristo Mwokozi wetu. Ee Bwana Yesu Kristo, Neno la Mungu, Mungu wetu, kupitia kwa maombi ya mtakatifu Maria, na watakatifu wako wote, utuhifadhi, na utuwezeshe tuanze vyema, na utuhurumie kulingana na mapenzi yako ya milele. Usiku umepita, na tunakushukuru Ee Bwana, na tunakuomba utuokoe, na utulinde siku hii bila dhambi.
Kutoka kwa Waraka wa Paulo kwa (Waefeso 4:1 – 5)

Kwa hiyo nawasihi, mimi niliye mfungwa katika Bwana, mwenende kama inavyoustahili wito wenu mlioitiwa; kwa unyenyekevu wote na upole, kwa uvumilivu, mkichukuliana katika upendo; na kujitahidi kuuhifadhi umoja wa Roho katika kifungo cha amani. Mwili mmoja, na Roho mmoja, kama na mlivyoitwa katika tumaini moja la wito wenu. Bwana mmoja, imani moja, ubatizo mmoja.
IMANI YA KANISA

Moja ni Mungu Baba wa wote, Moja ni mwana wake Yesu Kristo, Neno, aliyechukua mwili, akafa, na akafufuka siku ya tatu kutoka kwa wafu, na akatufufua pamoja naye. Moja ni Roho Mtakatifu, Mfariji, aliyetoka kwa Baba, anayetakasa viumbe vyote, na kutufundisha jinsi ya kusujudia Utatu Mtakatifu Mungu mmoja na kwa tabia moja. Tunamsifu na tunambariki daima, Amina.

Maombi ya asubuhi ya siku hii iliyobarikiwa, tunamtolea Kristo Mfalme wetu na Mungu wetu, tukimwomba atusamehe dhambi zetu. Kutoka kwa Zaburi na nyimbo za mwalimu wetu Daudi nabii na mfalme, baraka zake ziwe nasi sote, Amina.

array.name: prepsalm_eng
array.item: †\nMORNING PRAYER\n(FIRST HOUR)

Oh come, let us worship, Oh come let us ask Christ our God. Oh come, let us worship, Oh come let us ask Christ our King. Oh come, let us worship, Oh come let us implore Christ our Savior. Our Lord, Jesus Christ, the Word of God,our God, keep us through the intercessions of St. Mary and all your saints, and let us enjoy a fresh start. Have mercy upon us according to your will forever. The night has passed away, we thank you, O Lord, and ask You to keep us this day without sin and deliver us.
From Saint Paul Epistle to the (Ephesians 4:1-5)

As a prisoner for the Lord, then, I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received. Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love. Make every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace. There is one Body and one Spirit, just as you were called to one hope when you were called. One Lord, one faith, one baptism.
CHURCH FAITH

One is God, Father of everyone. One is also His Son, Jesus Christ the Word who was incarnate, died, rose from the dead on the third day, and raised us up with Him. One is the Holy Spirit, the Comforter, One of His hypostasis who proceeds from the Father, purifies the whole creation, and teaches us to worship the Holy Trinity, in one divinity, and one nature. We praise Him, we bless Him forever, Amen.

The Prayer of the First Hour of this blessed day we offer to Christ our King and God, beseeching Him to forgive us our sins. From the Psalms of our teacher, David the prophet and the king, may his blessings be with us all, Amen.
